### full model
$$
P(\vec{\theta}_i,\vec\pi,\vec{\alpha},\vec\beta | {\bf x}, \vec N) \propto
\Big(
\prod_i
P(\vec x_i|\vec{\theta}_i,N_i)
P(\vec{\theta}_i|\vec \pi\cdot\beta)
\Big)
P(\vec \pi | \vec \alpha)
P(\alpha)
P(\beta)
$$
### Likelihood
$$
\vec{x_i}\sim \text{Multinomial}(\vec{\theta}_i,N_i)
$$
### Prior
$$
\vec{\theta_i} \sim \text{Dirichlet}(\vec{\pi}\cdot \beta)
$$
### Hyperpriors
$$
\vec\pi \sim \text{Dirichlet}(\vec\alpha)
\\
\vec\alpha \sim P(\cdot)
\tiny{\text{  possibly gamma}}
\\
\beta \sim P(\cdot) 
\tiny{\text{  possibly exponential}}
$$
